WELCOME TO CROSSFIT FITNESS

Join the world's largest
community or fitness & health

With over 14 thousand independently owned Fitness gyms, our locations offer dedicated fitness professionals with the shared goal of improving health and happiness for everyone!

Why join our gym

Our courses and
certifications are open to
anyone.

You don't have to be a fitness instructor to benefit from the services we offer - and with 50% off a yearly pass, now's a great time to take out a membership.

  • 1

    Train when you want. Most of our locations are open 24 hours with friendly staff always on site.

  • 2

    Each workout is different. The magic is in the movements, and our crossfit routes are matched to you.

  • 3

    The key to health and fitness. Crossfit is a lifestyle that includes safe, effective exercises and sound nutrition.
